import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import GoogleSignin from "../components/GoogleSignin"; import { Form, Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function SignIn(props) { const {email, setEmail, password, setPassword, handleSignIn, handleSignUp, hasAccount, setHasAccount, emailError, passwordError} = props; return (

Sign in!

Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} > We'll never share your email with anyone else.

{emailError}

 Password setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{passwordError}
{hasAccount ? ( <>

Don't have an account?Sign Up

) : ( <>

Have an account ?Sign In

)}
) }
